regulatory.translation[0].definitions[0]: a regulatory authority has the official power to control an activity and to make sure that it is done in a satisfactory way
New drugs have been approved by the regulatory authority.
regulatory.translation[1].definitions[0]: having the purpose of controlling an activity, system, or industry, especially by rules
The industry has set up a number of regulatory bodies.
the regulatory authority for the marketing of life assurance and unit trusts
